Title: Last Hurrah: Zaralek Caverns and Time Rifts
Description:
Our allies are once again requesting your aid, $n.

In the Zaralek caverns the Dragonscale Expedition needs you to protect their researchers.

We're also concerned with the Zaqali invasions in the Ohn'ahran Plains and Azure Span.

Meanwhile, the Bronze Dragonflight has asked for you to help them deal with temporal anomalies to the east of Valdrakken.

Hurry $n, time is of the essence.
ObjectivesText: Protect the Researchers under Fire, loot a Secured Shipment from a Suffusion Camp, and assist Soridormi in dispelling a Time Rift.
CompletionText: Do you bring news of your success?
